name: Berta TAFFINGER, Appellant, v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW
name_abbreviation: Taffinger v. Unemployment Compensation Board of Review

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
parties: Berta TAFFINGER, Appellant, v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Clifford Blaze, Deputy Chief Counsel, Maribeth Milt-Seibert, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
618 A.2d 394
Berta TAFFINGER, Appellant, v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 9, 1992.
Decided Jan. 7, 1993.
Mark S. Love, for appellant.
Clifford Blaze, Deputy Chief Counsel, Maribeth Milt-Seibert, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
